passage.title: A good teacher
passage.paragraph: Mike is an English teacher. He is not young, but he is not old. He has a round face and brown hair. He is tall. He often wears a white shirt and black trousers. There are fifty students in his class. They all like him.

Now it's morning. Look, some students are reading, some are writing in the classroom. Mike is there, too. He is helping them to study English. He is a good teacher, and he is a good friend of them all.
